questions.prompt: Lynn: Does Brian play dodge ball every Sunday?  Tina: Yes, ____.
questions.explain: 肯定簡答要用助動詞：Yes, he does.

questions.prompt: Ann: ____ your mother a housewife?  Sue: Yes, ____.
questions.explain: 問句主詞是 your mother（第三人稱單數），用 Is；答句用 she 代替。

questions.prompt: Amy: Are Ben and his brother students?  Bella: Ben is, but his brother ____.
questions.explain: 前面肯定 Ben 是；後句是否定『他哥哥不是』→ isn’t。

questions.prompt: Peggy: Is Scott’s uncle a police officer?  Neil: ____  He’s an office worker.
questions.explain: 敘述指出他是上班族而不是警察→否定且主詞 he：No, he isn’t.

questions.prompt: Nigel has thin lips, but his daughter ____.
questions.explain: 主詞 his daughter（第三人稱單數），否定用 doesn’t。

questions.prompt: Zac: Hi. I’m Zac. Nice to meet you.  Elsa: Hi. I’m Elsa. ____
questions.explain: 對應寒暄句型：Nice to meet you, too.
問『身高多少』要用 How tall...?

questions.prompt: Ian is one hundred and eighty centimeters tall. He is good at playing basketball, so he ____.
questions.explain: 身高高、球打得好 → 合理推論在校隊：is on the school team。

questions.prompt: Stephen Curry is a great NBA player from the USA, and ____. Everyone likes him.
questions.explain: 承接前句描述球員 → 他很擅長打籃球。

questions.prompt: Ken: Who is young and handsome?  Bill: ____.
choices: Our new teacher, Mr. Chen, is.
questions.explain: Wh- 問『誰』當主詞；答案用名詞片語 + is：Our new teacher, Mr. Chen, is.
